DOC.brief_summary: This study last 62 week . You visit clinic 17 time . Certain clinic visit include physical examination , medical history review lung function test . The purpose study see one asthma drug ( fluticasone propionate/salmeterol ) well reduce number asthma exacerbation compare another drug ( fluticasone propionate alone )
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Asthma In Patients Of African Descent
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : History asthma least 6 month . Taking lowdose inhale corticosteroid least one month prior study ( fluticasone propionate budesonide ) . Exclusion criterion : History lifethreatening asthma . Hospitalized asthma within 3 month prior study . Current respiratory tract infection . Will able attend clinic visit entire length study . Certain medical condition make study unsafe ( congestive heart failure , uncontrolled hypertension , tuberculosis certain drug allergy ) .
